info.title: Waste Transportation Documents
info.description: This service enables you to display Waste Transportation Documents and information on associated Products and Partners. The Partner and Product data stems from the waste business partners and waste materials linked to the Waste Transportation Document respectively. You can also update some properties of Partners and Documents which is further explained in the business documentation. This synchronous inbound service is based on the OData version 4 protocol and can be consumed by external systems.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve and update existing waste transportation documents using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: EHS - Authority Servers with E-Waste Documents Integration(SAP_COM_0688)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

Content-Type: application/http

GET TranspDoc HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

{...}
--response-separator--
